about_the_game:
"

Necessary Evil: Invasion (Revised Edition)

Villains rise after the heroes fall!
When all the super heroes of the world are blown to kingdom come by an army of invading aliens, who will save the day? The only forces left to take on the alien menace are the crafty and self-serving super villains!
The original block-buster campaign is back, and updated for
Savage Worlds Adventure Edition (
SWADE ) and the
Super Powers Companion (
SPC ). Four-color villains (Power Level III) fight to save Earth from the clutches of the evil v'sori invaders. You might be a bad guy, but it's still
your planet these pesky aliens are tearing up. This book features the first appearance of the outrageous Outsider and the deadly Dr. Destruction.
"
